name: Tighk
description:
So i finished this little project i've been working on for about 2 weeks. I am really not into level or sound design, so i have decided to make it really small.

It has nothing but a mario-like gameplay.

I took the music from this awesome website

Software that i use:

  • Game Maker: Studio
  • Bfxr
  • Graphics Gale: Free Edition

Hope, you will like it despite shortness. :3

UPD: im thinking of releasing tileset separately. (anyway, i have to add more tiles, but if you're interested - write me on email or twitter). And i am not really good at english, so.. hope you understand.

Contacts: @ustance_uitch ; mr.dissmaly@gmail.com
